LOE GLASS OPTION: Standard window glass isn't capable of filtering out heat in the summer, or retaining heat in the winter. LoE coatings boost the insulating value by 40%, reducing the build-up of condensation and protects your interior furnishings from fading in.

SIMPLY-CLEAN: With our Standard Simply-Clean® coating, the sun will actually help to keep your windows clean. As the sun's rays contact the coating, Simply-Clean® is activated, helping loosen dust, dirt and other organic deposits.

MULTICHAMBER POLYRESIN 3 PVC: Our advanced multi-chamber vinyl frame, manufactured from our exclusive Lead-free, 100% virgin Polyresin 3® PVC. Designed to draw moisture away from the window to the drains, reducing condensation and the formation of mould and mildew.

PREMIUM HEAVY DUTY HARDWARE: Every window utilizes the finest available hardware. This includes foldaway handles and high quality, push down, fiber glass screens.

FLY MAZE: As a standard practice, the windows are installed with a sponge-like insect guard inside our hollow multi-chamber frames. This prevents insects from nesting or entering through the window frame.

FUSION MITRED WELDED SASH AND FRAME: All the window sashes and frames are precision-mitred, then fusion welded using extreme heat and pressure. This ensures a virtually inseparable bond at every joint.

 TRIPLE WEATHER SEALS: These seals are oversized for higher performance and built into the frame to prevent any air transfer, allowing for a completely sealed unit.
